title: Lean Body Mass (LBM) Calculator | Health & Fitness Body Metrics

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Boer (1984), male: \( \mathrm{LBM}_m = 0.407\,W + 0.267\,H - 19.2 \) Boer (1984), female: \( \mathrm{LBM}_f = 0.252\,W + 0.473\,H - 48.3 \) Hume (1966), male: \( \mathrm{LBM}_m = 0.32810\,W + 0.33929\,H - 29.5336 \) Hume (1966), female: \( \mathrm{LBM}_f = 0.29569\,W + 0.41813\,H - 43.2933 \) James (1976), male: \( \mathrm{LBM}_m = 1.10\,W - 128\,\frac{W^2}{H^2} \) James (1976), female: \( \mathrm{LBM}_f = 1.07\,W - 148\,\frac{W^2}{H^2} \) From body fat percentage: \( \mathrm{LBM} = W \times \left(1 - \frac{\mathrm{BFP}}{100}\right) \) Where W = weight (kg), H = height (cm), BFP = body fat percent.

sources.label: Direct links via PubMed and publisher sites where available
